description: Extended CoIndex export schema with Layer 2 blocks: co_spirit, meta_evo, visibility, harvest.
notes: This schema does not break v1 exports.
Existing helpers may continue to emit v1 until upgraded.
New helpers can target v2 to take advantage of Layer 2 fields.

fields.source_uri: Pointer to source asset (eg github://, file://, https://)
fields.tuples: Array of C,I,X,S,K tuples describing meaning and context.

reputation.merit_rank: 0.0..1.0, trust derived from MeritRank and other signals.

co_spirit.description: CoSpirit block for future and mythos-style alignment signals.

fields.humility: 0.0..1.0 or null. How explicitly we admit this is partial or uncertain.
fields.congruence_hint: Short free text about why this feels deeply aligned or coherent.
fields.mythos_frame: Label for larger story context (CoCivia, Godspawn, CoTree, etc).
fields.awe_factor: 0.0..1.0 or null. Soft signal that this points at something 'bigger than us'.
fields.unknowns_acknowledged: Array of bullet-point unknowns or open mysteries.
fields.experimental_tags: Array of free-form tags such as ['CoSpirit','CoMystic','Preimage'].

meta_evo.description: Meta-evolution hints for future stewards and AIs.

fields.evo_timescale: fast, seasonal, long-horizon, or similar labels.
fields.candidate_axes: Array of dimensions likely to matter (safety, reach, explainability, etc).
fields.open_questions: Array of guiding questions for future evolution.
fields.related_theories: Array of pointers into CoTheories, CoCore, or other repos.
fields.future_slots: Object reserved for future subfields; helpers should not assume a fixed shape.

visibility.description: Controls how far this CoPointee can be exposed across platform barriers.

fields.cloak_tag: Optional CoCloak label for sensitive clusters.
fields.risk_notes: Array of short free-text risk notes.
fields.review_required: Boolean flag for human or Co1 review before visibility upgrades.

harvest.description: Records how this pointee was harvested into CoIndex.

fields.priority_lane: tier1, tier2, tier3, or similar priority label.
fields.harvest_stamp: UTC timestamp the harvester last touched this pointee.
fields.notes: Array of short notes about why it was included or skipped.
